check_box.label: Fullscreen Mode
check_box.tool_tip: Controls if the Viewer should be started in Fullscreen mode next time.
check_box.name: Fullscreen

check_box.label: Fullscreen auto Aspect Ratio
check_box.tool_tip: Controls if the aspect of your Fullscreen resolution should be automatically detected or not
check_box.name: FullAspect

check_box.label: Enable Avatar Cloth Simulation
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles wavy cloth simulation on or off and can boost average FPS on some Systems. Doesnt work in Deferred Rendering!
check_box.name: AvatarCloth

check_box.label: Enable Avatar Physics Simulation
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Avatar Physics on or off, causing breasts aswell as butts and stomachs to simulate physical movement and interaction with gravity.
check_box.name: AvatarPhysics

check_box.label: Enable Anisotropic Filtering
check_box.tool_tip: Allows Anisotropic Filtering to unblur textures in certain camera angles
check_box.name: ani

check_box.label: Enable OpenGL 3.0 Texture Compression
check_box.tool_tip: Enable texture compression on OpenGL 2.1 and later implementations which should reduce video memory bloat (Experimental, requires restart)
check_box.name: CompressTextures

check_box.label: Enable Fullbright
check_box.tool_tip: Tell the Viewer to ignore the Fullbright flags on Object creation resulting in no Fullbrights until restart/revisit - WARNING! , does not work with Objects that use an old set prim attribute LIGHT script command!
check_box.name: EnableFullbright

check_box.label: Render Attached Lights
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles rendering of lights which are attached to your or other Avatars on or off. Usefull for annoying facelights
check_box.name: attached_lights

check_box.label: Render Attached Particles
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles rendering of particles which are attached to your or other Avatars on or off. Usefull for particle spammers
check_box.name: attached_particles

check_box.label: Render Transparent Water
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles transparent water, false renders water as opaque with a simple texture applied. Must be enabled for Vertex Shader water reflections in some cases
check_box.name: RenderTransparentWater

combo_box.tool_tip: Control the overall size of the User Interface (Small = 0.8 , Normal = 1.0 , Big 1.2)
combo_box.name: UIScaleFactor

slider.label: Draw Distance:
slider.name: FarClip
slider.tool_tip: Controls the view distance of Objects starting from your avatar in meters

slider.label: Particle Amount:
slider.name: MaxParticles
slider.tool_tip: Controls the maximum amount of Particles rendered on screen.

combo_box.tool_tip: Controls the overall sharpness of default ground textures by increasing the repeats. Too high settings may cause the ground to repeat every meter making it look bad!
combo_box.name: TerrainTexDrop
Lightcount
combo_box.tool_tip: Control wether you want to see all lights , just a few lights or none
Controls overall detail level of Prims on distance. Level-of-Detail might need to be disabled in order for this to take a great visible effect!
combo_box.name: ObjectLODDrop

combo_box.tool_tip: Controls detail level of rendered Avatar meshes and is an important factor for Avatar Imposters
combo_box.name: AvatarLODDrop

combo_box.tool_tip: Controls detail levek of Terrain on distance
combo_box.name: TerrainLODDrop

combo_box.tool_tip: Controls the amount of ressources used to simulate Avatar physics
combo_box.name: AVPhysics

check_box.label: Enable OpenGL Vertex Buffer Objects
check_box.name: vbo
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this on modern hardware gives a performance gain. However, older hardware often has poor implementations of VBOs and you may get crashes when this is enabled.

check_box.label: Use Dynamic Level of Detail
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles dynamic Level-of-Detail which automatically adjusts the detail of meshes, prims and sculpts on increasing distance. Can boost your performance but should be kept off if you want to have all objects on a 'full-rezzed' like state at all times
check_box.name: DynamicLOD

check_box.label: Use Object-Object Occlusion
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Occlusion which prevents objects behind other objects beeing rendered which can boost your performance depending on how much it is used in the scene e.g in empty places it will just hurt your performance rather than increasing it.
check_box.name: UseOcclusion

check_box.label: Use Simple Avatar Impostors
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Avatar Impostors on or off which replace all Avatars exceeding your set amount with 2D sprites which can boost your performance significantly. Depends on your Max Avatar Visible and Avatar Quality settings
check_box.name: AvatarImpostors

combo_box.tool_tip: Controls the maximum amount of Avatars rendered on Screen
combo_box.name: AvatarCountDrop

check_box.label: Use Full Control Gamma
check_box.name: RenderGammaFull
check_box.tool_tip: Use fully controllable gamma correction, instead of faster, hard-coded gamma correction.

check_box.label: Use Stream Draw
check_box.name: vbostream
check_box.tool_tip: Dynamic draw updates per frame, Stream draw per render. Driver/GPU tweak may alter Graphics Bandwidth

check_box.label: Use Plugin Read Thread
check_box.tool_tip: Use a seperate Thread to read incoming messages from Plugins like Webprims etc.
check_box.name: PluginUseReadThread

check_box.label: Use Far Clip
check_box.tool_tip: Switches between the normal Camera Mode where Objects get derendered when moving your Camera away from them and a more -from Avatar- like rendering method where everything until your Render Range gets rendered no matter if you are zooming away
check_box.name: RenderUseFarClip

slider.label: Background Yield Time:
slider.tool_tip: Set the amount of time in ms which the Viewer should be held back when not beeing focused , 40 equals ~18 FPS
slider.name: BackgroundYieldTime

combo_box.tool_tip: Enable advanced options to determite which avatars should be rendered and which shouldn't
combo_box.name: AutoDerenderDropdown

check_box.label: Vertex Shader
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles the Vertex Shader allowing ripple water, reflections on water and a much more realistic sky with clouds aswell as Post Process Glow. Known as 'Windlight'
check_box.name: BasicShaders

check_box.label: Use Atmospheric Shader
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles the Atmospheric Shader rendering the scene more realistic by adding additional light calculations. Needs Vertex Shader!
check_box.name: WindLightUseAtmosShaders

check_box.label: Use Water Mip-maps
check_box.tool_tip: Use Mip-maps on distance for water (blurrier/low resolution textures to prevent usage of high resolution textures on distance which results in extreme water pixelation)
check_box.name: MipMaps

combo_box.tool_tip: Changes the resolution of water reflections. This option might have a significant impact on performance on any setting higher than High
combo_box.name: ReflectionRes

check_box.label: Enable Hardware Skinning
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles skinning by your Hardware and enables some advanced rendering features like Avatar cloth simulation. Needed for Deferred Rendering!
check_box.name: AvatarVertexProgram

check_box.label: Render Post Process Glow
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles the glowing of Prims and environment in some circumstances. Glow appearance and strength can be manipulated in the 'Lighting Tab' - needs Vertex Shader to run and is needed for Deferred Rendering
check_box.name: Glow

combo_box.tool_tip: Controls the resolution of Post Process Glow
combo_box.name: PostProcessDrop

combo_box.tool_tip: Controls sky resolution in Windlight and Deferred Rendering. All settings beyond High might cause a little performance drop and usually dont show a visible effect!
combo_box.name: SkyLODDrop

check_box.label: Deferred Rendering
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Deferred Rendering adding shadows cast by and on Prims, Avatars and the World aswell as uses a new lighting which allows Projected Lights/Textures which can also drop shadows. Vertex Shader, Atmospheric Shader, Post Process Glow and Hardware Skinning are needed to use this!
check_box.name: Deferred

combo_box.tool_tip: Toggles FXAA (Fast Aprox. Anti-aliasing) on or off. This setting can greatly enhance image quality without having any impact on performance.
combo_box.name: fsaa

check_box.label: Render Deferred Lights
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles normal lights and projected lights in Deferred Rendering on or off altogether. Warning this might also disable lights in Windlight!
check_box.name: UseLightShaders

combo_box.name: ShadowDetail
combo_box.tool_tip: No Shadows - Disables shadows completly seperate from the new lighting system , Less Shadows - Renders only normal shadows thrown by sun , All Shadows - Renders all shadows , projected lights inclusive

check_box.label: Render Advanced Materials
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Bumpmapping and shiny surfaces which reflect lights of the environment
check_box.name: BumpShiny

combo_box.tool_tip: Controls the strength and resolution ration when generating Normal Maps on Bumpmaps (needs turning on/off any higher graphic relevant option)
combo_box.name: BumpStrengthSelection
ShadowStyle
combo_box.tool_tip: Toggle between Tofu's new Shadow softening algorythm or the old original one

slider.label: Shadowmap Width:
slider.tool_tip: Set the width of the shadowmap
slider.name: RenderShadowResolution_X

slider.label: Shadowmap Height:
slider.tool_tip: Set the height of the shadowmap
slider.name: RenderShadowResolution_Y

slider.label: Shadowmap Multiplicator:
slider.tool_tip: Set the the multiplicator value for width and height of the shadowmap
slider.name: RenderShadowResolution_Z

slider.label: Shadow Blur Size:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of each blur pass of shadows
slider.name: RenderShadowBlurSize

check_box.label: Depth of Field
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles a camera like Depth of Field effect on or off, often used to blur out distance or things that shouldnt be in focus
check_box.name: UseDoF

slider.label: Field of View(°):
slider.name: CameraFOV
slider.tool_tip: Vertical camera field of view for Depth of Field effect (in degrees)

slider.label: F-Number:
slider.name: CameraFNum
slider.tool_tip: Camera f-number value for Depth of Field effect

slider.label: Focal Length(mm):
slider.name: CameraFocal
slider.tool_tip: Camera focal length for Depth of Field effect (in millimeters)

slider.label: Circle of Confusion:
slider.name: CameraCoF
slider.tool_tip: Set the Camera circle of confusion

slider.label: Focus Transition Time(s):
slider.name: CameraFocusTrans
slider.tool_tip: Time taken to alter focus from one place to the next

slider.label: Resolution Scale:
slider.name: CameraDoFRes
slider.tool_tip: Set the Resolution (Quality) of each DoF pixel

check_box.label: Ambient Occlusion
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Ambient Occlusion, blurs Shadows (Shadow Softening) and renders SSAO which adds small dark edges and transitions.
check_box.name: UseSSAO

slider.label: SSAO Blur Size:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of each blur pass of SSAO
slider.name: RenderShadowGaussian_Y

check_box.label: Render Screen Space Reflections
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Screen Space Reflections on shiny surfaces creating very realistic reflective surfaces but will need a monstrous PC
check_box.name: RenderScreenSpaceReflections

check_box.label: Motion Blur
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles if fast movement should be blurred
check_box.name: MotionBlur

check_box.label: Godrays
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles if sunshafts should be rendered
check_box.name: Godrays

check_box.label: Lens Flare Effect
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles the sun light reflection on your camera on or off.
check_box.name: LensFlare

check_box.label: Tone Mapping
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles if Tone Mapping should be used while Deferred Rendering is active, it might cause the whole scene to look more/less colorfull and increase/decrease the overall scene brightness difference making the scene look dull
check_box.name: ToneMapping
